TableView.name: VIEW_SMP6_PAINEL_ACOMP
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP6_PAINEL_ACOMP" ("DATA", "PMM", "CN", "SMP6") AS
WITH dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as (select DATA, PMM, MSC, CN, CHAM_ENT60, EXPURGO_TOTAL, CHAM_TOT, OK, NOK from view_msc_vinculo_smp6 where codigo != 'NID'

),Dias AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') AS Data
FROM CDRVIEW_SMP6 Dt
WHERE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1
AND TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10
),
MesAno AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') AS Data FROM CDRVIEW_SMP6 Dt
),
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano AS
(SELECT Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) AS data
FROM Dias Dias,
Mesano Mesano
),
Smps_dados AS
(SELECT Data AS DATA,
TO_CHAR(CN) AS CN,
CASE
WHEN SMP6_B = '0'
AND SMP6_A != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP6_B = '-'
AND SMP6_A = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP6_B != '-'
AND SMP6_A = '-'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP6_A / SMP6_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '-')
END AS SMP6
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Tab.CN,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.CHAM_ENT60, 0) + NVL(Tab.EXPURGO_TOTAL, 0))), '-') AS Smp6_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OK, 0) + NVL(Tab.NOK, 0))), '-') AS SMP6_B
FROM dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab,
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp6 b
WHERE TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') IN
(SELECT Dias.Data FROM Dias
)
and tab.msc = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Tab.CN
)
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm AS
(SELECT to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS Data,
Cn.nome
FROM CN Cn,
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp AS
(SELECT NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) AS Data,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.SMP6), '-') AS SMP6,
Diascnpmm.nome AS Cn
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm,
Smps_Dados Smpdados
WHERE TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+))
AND Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)
)
SELECT TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS data,
'PMM' AS pmm,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn),'-') AS CN,
CASE
WHEN Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP6 != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP6) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP6,'.',',')
END AS SMP6
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn),
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY');
